system.description:
If an Avenger has a Wisdom score of 13 or higher, they can cast cleric spells as if they were a cleric of one-third their level (rounding down). For example, a 12th–14th level Avenger casts spells as a 4th-level cleric. If the Avenger’s Wisdom is 12 or lower, they cannot cast spells but can still be an Avenger.

To gain this ability, the Avenger must learn meditation and spellcasting from clerics of their order. This training comes at a cost determined by the DM, with a suggested minimum of 10,000 gp per cleric spell level gained.
